JOB DESCRIPTION: About the role    A proven Java Developer with 4-6 years of strong technical experience in development of cloud-based solutions using AWS/Java/Javascript tech stack. He/She required to work for a FMS product in FMS domain.   Responsibilities include    Work with development teams, product owners and product managers, subject matter experts/architects to implement software solutions     Provide Design solutions/ideas related to client-side and server-side architecture     Develop components as required to meet sprint / release goals     Build frameworks that can be adopted by applications for SaaS     Work with all stakeholders like Architect, Devops, CloudOps teams to ensure all tools are configured (CI/CD/Automation) and technical challenges/dependencies are addressed     Understand functional/business requirements through user stories and translate into technical requirements and implement accordingly.     Develop and manage well-functioning database/data as a service     Write effective APIs, Troubleshoot, debug and upgrade software     Test software to ensure responsiveness and efficiency     Create security and data protection settings     Write technical documentation as required    Key Skills    Develop in AWS using the web services     Implement Automated CI/CD processes using Jenkins, Harness tools     Develop frameworks with SaaS as mindset     Front end: HTML 5, CSS, Advanced JavaScript, Angular JS, jQuery, Bootstrap     Server side / Framework: Java 8 / Java 11/ APIs/Spring/Springboot2 / EJB / STRUTS      Tools: Git/GitHub, Jenkins, SonarQube    Desirable Skills   Agile, Jira, Pair programming, TDD    Cloud: AWS, S3, SQS, SNS, API Gateway, Lambda, knowledge of DynamoDB, Mongo DB     Good communication skills   Analytical and efficient Development skills  Duties An opportunity to join our high performing team of Software Developers in India working on in-house products.
